Parameters.Name: RECORDING-3-1-9 RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON RECEIVER)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-3-1-9 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON RECEIVER)
Test.Name: Correct response (DynamicRecording is True)
Test.Description:
Annex A.12:
DynamicRecording is True No Recording Jobs JobOptions Spare="2"

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON RECEIVER)
Test.Name: Correct response (DynamicRecording is false)
Test.Description: Annex A.12: DynamicRecording is false There is Recording with VIDEO track and Job Spare =2

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON RECEIVER)
Test.Name: Annex A.12: There is NO Recording with VIDEO track
Test.Description: DynamicRecording is false There is NO Recording with VIDEO track

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-3-1-9 RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON RECEIVER)
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that recording list is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Search for recordings with video track There are no recordings with video track. Please, configure recording with video track manually and rerun test STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Description: Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True The DUT sent SOAP 1.2 fault message (Action/MaxRecordingJobs) on the CreateRecordingJobRequest
